title: Calling lanes
body: Yeah, call  me a d*** or whatever, but I refuse to acknowledge it as something to follow, it's not a rule that Riot enforces and there is nothing wrong with duo lanes, it's normals and all I see it as is "Shotgunning" should be able to play wherever I want in normals for practice and so should everyone else, you don't own top, you don't own mid you don't own bot and neither do I, but everyone should be entitled to getting where they want in normals, having order in ranked is necessary but in normals, no.

replies.body: yeah but you're still an **a**sshole if someone calls a role in norms and you take it. calling lanes in norms is the equivalent of pick order in ranked, even if riot doesn't official support it.
How are you an **a**sshole?  it's not a rule and it's normals its meant to be for practicing and doing whatever you want (within riots set rules)

> [{quoted}](name=Friend Of Golems,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AcJwHLNJ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-03-04T04:56:41.090+0000)
>
> How are you an **a**sshole?  it's not a rule and it's normals its meant to be for practicing and doing whatever you want (within riots set rules)

it's an unwritten rule.
It's actually not a rule at all.

> [{quoted}](name=Friend Of Golems,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AcJwHLNJ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-03-04T04:56:41.090+0000)
>
> How are you an **a**sshole?  it's not a rule and it's normals its meant to be for practicing and doing whatever you want (within riots set rules)

riot doesn't enforce pick order either in ranked

lmao I like the "Meta-sheep" argument.

If I want to go off-meta with duo mid I prefer not to do it with some random guy.

You're an ass, people who call mid arent saying that they want to play in the middle lane, they want to play the mid role which means a champion in the middle lane, not duo mid lane with some random guy who refuses to cooperate with the team. For them you are stopping them from playing what they want, effectively ruining games.

Thats why you are wrong, just because you want something you ruin what other 4 other people want, even when you have the ability to get what you want by following the system that the other people have respected, but you are superior to them and dont have to follow that system because what you want is the most important, not the other 4 human beings wants.

perfectly said

hi, Well actually, while it doesn't clearly have it as a rule  it still falls under their other rules:

1. Communicating with your team, it's part of communication, if you "Instalock" and just say "I'm going top"  then that doesn't leave much to communication,  you may tell them where you're going but you're not being very helpful.

2. Support Your Team: Part of the summoners code, instalocking and taking lanes to mess others up definitely isn't supporting your team.

3. Enjoy Yourself, but not at Anyone Else's Expense: Yeah another part of the summoners code, so your, I can do what I want in normals is wrong.


I suggest you read this  http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/get-started/summoners-code/ 


You're still breaking the rules, I'll give you an example: Even though there's no specific law against killing someone with a blue fish on Friday it still falls under other laws, I hope you realize that you are indeed violating the summoners code, glad i could help - ur welcome
Well I'll be damned... eh, okay I guess it is a rule then, I guess I have no choice then to go along with it then, thanks for the info.
people like you are the reason I dodge games.
Tried Teambuilder yet?

There are five roles in Normal pvp game, top (top lane), mid (mid lane), Jungle (jungle), ADC (bot lane), Support (bot lane).
If you mean that you are getting frustrated because someone else called the role that you wanted, then you should just call another role. This happens to me, I wanted top or mid, but in some cases both of these roles were taken, so I had to call another role. Sometimes other people may call roles that you didn't want, so you can take the chance and call the role that you wanted.
In fact, if you want to practice a champion against human players, you should consider inviting a friend to verse you in custom game.

Riot should create a box at the start of normal games when in champ select such as make it random so its always not in the same position when seeing the [TOP] [MID] [JG] [ADC] and [SUP] boxes so when you join u have to click it to chose lanes you want instead of calling which causes issues. once click on your preferred position it then goes gray so other players cant click on it, which makes them have to choose something else.
I agree with your idea.

Riot should create a box at the start of normal games when in champ select such as make it random so its always not in the same position when seeing the [TOP] [MID] [JG] [ADC] and [SUP] boxes so when you join u have to click it to chose lanes you want instead of calling which causes issues. once click on your preferred position it then goes gray so other players cant click on it, which makes them have to choose something else.

Its called respect something you clearly do not have, when someone says they would like top and have called it first, you respect there call and let them go top while you find another lane to go to, not doing so is you being an **a**sshole and showing no respect for other players, keep this crap up and you will be banned soon, we'll see how much you "refuse" when your account is dead.

Riot should create a box at the start of normal games when in champ select such as make it random so its always not in the same position when seeing the [TOP] [MID] [JG] [ADC] and [SUP] boxes so when you join u have to click it to chose lanes you want instead of calling which causes issues. once click on your preferred position it then goes gray so other players cant click on it, which makes them have to choose something else.
I agree 100%

I'm not calling lanes, I'm just saying where I'm going.
Idgaf if you called mid before me, I'm still going mid. Everytime I fill or be nice I get stuck with an idiot and lose, I'd rather solo carry midlane freelo.
f a g
Same with me, I tell people where I'm going, it's a normals game because meta isn't enforced.

It's not as if you're obliged to follow call order, it's only there to provide some order in the way people choose their champions. You have every right to try out new things however I feel you should keep in mind that just because you don't want to acknowledge 'call order' as a thing it doesn't mean people wont follow it. This game is full of META sheep and, if you're going to go off-META, you need to accept those people will get sh!tty when they don't get their way.
I know that's the case, I'm simply saying  that I'm sick of meta sheeps and I'll go where I want, there's nothing wrong with duo mid or duo top or triple bot or whatever

There is cause you lose and it's not fair on the rest of the team. Just copy past your sh-it if your not fast enough to type it out and ull get ur lane if not tough shiz play another champ another lane

Soooooo you'd like to have 5 adcs just purely because 5 adcs want to practice adc? Would you be happy with that? Or would you want every lane to be within meta? Don't be a bronze douchebag. Learn to play and git gud
I wouldn't mind 5 Adcs.
5 times the uselessness
Are you bronze?
No
Nice meme
It's not a rule, just a common courtesy. If you want to keep fighting with people in champ select, don't adhere to it, but it's nicer when your team gets along.

prob is every1 wants to do what the pros do, they dont have their own minds to make up new stratergies. and first thing they want to do is report u for not playing the current meta. ppl just cry espesially of u die once, and then the rage starts and they cry all match cause they are toxic and want things done how the pros do it
gg rito report ap lee song and adc leblonc
you sound like an asshole :D one that i don't ever wish to queue up with
